meanings.definition: The state or quality of being infested with lice.
meanings.sent1: The lousiness of the situation was evident from the constant scratching.
meanings.sent2: The lousiness of the old mattress was due to the presence of tiny insects.
meanings.sent3: The lousiness of the picnic was unexpected when the ants decided to join.
meanings.sent4: The lousiness of the situation spread faster than a lice infestation.
meanings.sent5: The lousiness of the room was so severe that even the walls seemed to itch.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being of poor quality or character.
meanings.sent1: The lousiness of the product was evident in its cheap materials.
meanings.sent2: The lousiness of his behavior was clear when he refused to apologize.
meanings.sent3: The lousiness of the joke made everyone groan instead of laugh.
meanings.sent4: The lousiness of the situation was like a stain that couldn't be washed away.
meanings.sent5: The lousiness of the movie made it hard to sit through without cringing.
